name: Roundabout Rowdy
description:
Note: If the web version isn't running very smoothly on your system, you may download the Windows build further below. Alternatively we also uploaded a web build with low graphics setting that you can try here.

This game has been made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 47.

In Roundabout Rowdy you play as a rowdy driver that is stuck in a roundabout. Your goal is to create as much destruction as possible while being stylish at it when cruising your rounds.

Controls
  • WASD: Accelerate, steer & break
  • Space: Break
Gameplay

You control a rowdy driver in a small roundabout. From the four corners, various vehicles will enter the streets. Your goal is to take out as many as possible by crashing into them or using other means. Ramming other vehicles from behind will minimize your own damage. Try not to wreck your own car!

Additionally you have to maintain your rowdiness, so you have to drive full laps every now and then. The timer in the middle indicates how much time is left for you to complete the next round. Don't miss a round or it's game over.

Destroyed cars will sometimes drop Power-Ups which you can collect to heal or gain special moves.

Assets and Resources

All assets and resources have been created ourselves - with one exception being the fonts (LEMON/MILK and COMIC KINGS ).
